post.body: Touch√©! I like that idea! You should get some compensation for wear and tear and worry and time without your belongings!
Dude, you come to NYC while I'M OUT OF THE COUNTRY? Wow.
Thanks!
Thanks for understanding. Maybe I shouldn't give up hope yet. (I wish I could go to London!) Appreciate your support!
Thank you! :-) Just really upset- lots of new clothes I bought a week ago for the trip, plus it was an AWESOME suitcase. Alas...
Thank you, my friend. Much appreciated!
Blueberry, Boysenberry, Strawberry, or Butter Pecan?
Good luck. I'm sure your trip will be fine. I'd like to chalk my experience up to bad luck. Let us know how it goes!
Hi. Thanks! Miami to JFK. Worst part is baggage was lost. 12 hours & they can't find it. But so much more was wrong about the trip.
Central America. There's limited Internet - you have to find Internet "cafes", which aren't even cafes, so you can't use a laptop!
RT @linksmonkey: Why should I stay up late to watch a ball drop on New Years Eve? I watched George Bush drop the ball for 8 years. Rimshot.
Trying to recall everything that was in my suitcase that American Airlines has yet to find, 18 hours after we landed. Not happy about this.
The good part about being sick: chicken & rice soup, white toast with grape jelly, Jell-O. The bad part about being sick: you're still sick.
I was wrong. You do suck. RT @davidbadash: Dear American Airlines, It's not that you suck...You're just somewhat incompetent and ridiculous.
The list of airlines I swear I'm never going to fly again keeps growing.
Dear America, FYI, it is not a law, you are not required to wear your gym clothes when traveling by air. In fact, it should be illegal.
RT @DAYWITHOUTAGAY: Merry Christmas, Everybody. Make sure to keep the conversation about equality going at the holiday dinner table.
What (the heck) is Apple doing at $85 a share? "Has Wall Street and the investing public lost faith in Apple?" http://poprl.com/9TE
Hugh Grant's birth name is "Hugh John Mungo Grant". I don't know why.
Please please please remind me to bring "Love Actually" with me so I can watch it on Christmas in "The Land The Internet Forgot".
